records.law_name: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA)
records.description: All fees must be reasonable and reflect actual costs
records.conditions: All fees must be reasonable and reflect actual costs

records.law_name: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA)
records.description: Cannot use fees to discourage requests

records.law_name: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA)
records.description: Provide cost estimates for extensive requests

records.law_name: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA)
records.description: Clear explanation of fee structure and payment requirements

records.law_name: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA)
records.description:
**Confidential by Law**: Records specifically made confidential by statute
**Voter Registration**: Certain voter registration information protected
**Public Safety**: Records that would jeopardize public safety or security
**Personal Privacy**: Information constituting invasion of personal privacy
**Law Enforcement**: Investigatory records and confidential sources
records.conditions:
**Confidential by Law**: Records specifically made confidential by statute
**Voter Registration**: Certain voter registration information protected
**Public Safety**: Records that would jeopardize public safety or security
**Personal Privacy**: Information constituting invasion of personal privacy
*
